channel.title: [Solved] Update Torbrowser
channel.description:
To update the torbrowser I download the new version with my old version. After this I extract the file into the "user" folder and linked the "start-tor-browser" to my desktop.
My question is: I do not use the english version, so do i have to rename the folder to "_en-US" like in the past? For me it looks like this step is no longer needed anymore, but to be sure I would like to ask here.
Thanks.

item.title: [Solved] Update Torbrowser
item.dc:creator: Updater
item.description:
To update the torbrowser I download the new version with my old version.
After this I extract the file into the “user” folder and linked the “start-tor-browser” to my desktop.

My question is: I do not use the english version, so do i have to rename the folder to “_en-US” like in the past?
For me it looks like this step is no longer needed anymore, but to be sure I would like to ask here.

Thanks.

Read full topic
